mapper.insert: insert into t_order (order_id, order_time, order_zhuangtai, order_jine, order_address, order_pay, order_userid) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderZhuangtai,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderJine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderPay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_order set order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_zhuangtai = #{orderZhuangtai,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_jine = #{orderJine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_address = #{orderAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_pay = #{orderPay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_userid = #{orderUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select order_id, order_time, order_zhuangtai, order_jine, order_address, order_pay, order_userid from t_order where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select order_id, order_time, order_zhuangtai, order_jine, order_address, order_pay, order_userid from t_order
